units

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • units.Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attacker, Healer

    public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Unit object on the grid
    Author:
    ewan633

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Unit()
      Creates a default unit with both hp and power at 10
      Unit(int hp, int power)
      Creates a unit

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void die()
      Makes unit die and removes him from grid
      void getHealed(Healer healer)
      Heals the unit
      int getPower()
      Returns the power level of the unit
      void levelUp()
      Levels the unit up; increases hp and power by a random number
      void move()
      Moves the unit
      void takeDamage(Weapon weapon)
      Makes the unit suffer damage

    • Constructor Detail

      • Unit

        public Unit()
        Creates a default unit with both hp and power at 10

      • Unit

        public Unit(int hp,
            int power)
        Creates a unit
        Parameters:
        hp - the amount of health points the unit will have
        power - the amount of damage/healing the unit will do
